DOC.detailed_description: A double-blind , single-centered , vehicle-controlled , randomized Phase IIa study WBI-1001 patient mild moderate Atopic Dermatitis ( AD ) . All body area treatable except face , scalp , groin genital area . Cream apply BID 6.00 10.00am 7.00 10.00pm daily 4 week . Blood draw PK analysis take weekly study centre prior morning cream application . Patients return study centre approximately one week later follow-up visit .
